content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Mallorca 0.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 3, Mallorca 0.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 3, Mallorca 0. Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Offside, Mallorca. Pierre Webó tries a through ball, but Fernando Cavenaghi is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Nsue.
Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca) is shown the red card for a bad foul.
Michael Pereira (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card.
Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca).
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Diego Costa replaces Fran Mérida.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pierre Webó.
Attempt saved. Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Paulo Assunção (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Paulo Assunção (Atlético de Madrid).
Pierre Webó (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Reyes with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Kevin.
Attempt missed. Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left from a direct free kick.
Foul by Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid).
Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Pierre Webó.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Diego Godín.
Foul by Pau Cendrós (Mallorca).
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Mallorca. Fernando Cavenaghi replaces Rubén.
Hand ball by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Filipe Luis replaces Diego Forlán.
Diego Forlán (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by David de Gea.
Penalty saved! Pierre Webó (Mallorca) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Antonio López (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the red card.
Penalty conceded by Antonio López (Atlético de Madrid) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Mallorca. Nsue draws a foul in the penalty area.
Pau Cendrós (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card.
Nsue (Mallorca) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Nsue (Mallorca).
Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Foul by Pierre Webó (Mallorca).
Tomas Ujfalusi (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pau Cendrós.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Dudu Aouate.
Attempt saved. Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Valera.
Foul by Rubén (Mallorca).
Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tiago (Atlético de Madrid).
Gonzalo Castro (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Antonio López (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Pau Cendrós (Mallorca).
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by David de Gea.
Attempt saved. Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Foul by Fran Mérida (Atlético de Madrid).
Nsue (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Michael Pereira.
Attempt missed. Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Juan Valera.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Nunes.
Foul by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Michael Pereira (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Fran Mérida (Atlético de Madrid).
Nsue (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Second Half begins Atlético de Madrid 2, Mallorca 0.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Juanfran replaces Elías.
First Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Mallorca 0.
Attempt missed. Michael Pereira (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro.
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Antonio López.
Attempt missed. Pierre Webó (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jonathan de Guzmán with a cross following a set piece situation.
Dangerous play by Antonio López (Atlético de Madrid).
Pau Cendrós (Mallorca) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Pierre Webó (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Paulo Assunção (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt missed. Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Antonio López with a cross.
Juan Valera (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Michael Pereira (Mallorca).

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 2, Mallorca 0. Diego Forlán (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fran Mérida with a through ball following a fast break.
Foul by Pierre Webó (Mallorca).
Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Pierre Webó (Mallorca) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro.
Hand ball by Tiago (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt missed. Nsue (Mallorca) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin with a cross.
Substitution, Mallorca. Gonzalo Castro replaces Víctor Casadesús because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Elías (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tiago.
Attempt missed. Diego Forlán (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Elías.
Attempt saved. Jonathan de Guzmán (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by João Victor.
Attempt missed. Elías (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Fran Mérida.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Mallorca 0. Juan Valera (Atlético de Madrid) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Reyes with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Rubén.
Attempt saved. Pierre Webó (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Reyes tries a through ball, but Fran Mérida is caught offside.
Foul by Rubén (Mallorca).
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Mallorca. Kevin tries a through ball, but Víctor Casadesús is caught offside.

Attempt missed. Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Nsue with a cross.
Attempt missed. Víctor Casadesús (Mallorca) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Pierre Webó with a headed pass.
